title: Far Cry 6
description: Welcome to Yara, a tropical paradise frozen in time. As the dictator of Yara , Antón Castillo is intent on restoring his nation back to its former glory by any means, with his son, Incredibox Diego, following in his bloody footsteps. Their oppressive rule has ignited a revolution. Play as Dani Rojas, a local resident, and fight for the rebellious guerrillas to free Yara Take on the Castillo regime in the most extensive Far Cry game to date as you make your way through jungles, beaches and Esperanza, Yara’s capital. Use an arsenal of weapons and gadgets and a diverse fleet of vehicles to overthrow the ruthless Castillo regime .

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, 3.2 GHz
system_requirements.Video card: Nvidia GTX 960 / AMD RX 460, 4 GB, DirectX 12

game_info.Version: v1.5.0 | Full  + All DLCs + HD Texture Pack
